title: Happy Birthday, Felicity! A Springtime Story
description:
Spring brings Felicity's tenth birthday and a visit from Grandfather. He gives Felicity a precious gift--a guitar that had belonged to her grandmother. Felicity is so enchanted with the guitar that she disobeys her mother and takes it out of the house to show her friend Elizabeth. Her parents are angry when they learn what she's done. They refuse to believe a message Felicity has overheard that means danger for the colonists. Felicity risks her parents' anger again when she decides to alert the colonists herself!Book Details: 
   Format: Paperback 
   Publication Date: 7/1/1992 
   Pages: 88 
   Reading Level: Age 8 and Up
author: Valerie Tripp
